author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION FORMS OFF THE COAST OF SOUTHERN MEXICO...
summary: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION FORMS OFF THE COAST OF SOUTHERN MEXICO... As of 3:00 PM CST Thu Sep 11 the center of Thirteen-E was located near 15.5, -98.8 with movement WNW at 6 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1009 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...TROPICAL DEPRESSION FORMS OFF THE COAST OF SOUTHERN MEXICO... As of 3:00 PM CST Thu Sep 11 the center of Thirteen-E was located near 15.5, -98.8 with movement WNW at 6 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1009 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Depression Thirteen-E (EP3/EP132025)
